trends: There have been 26 other sightings in New Orleans
There were no other sightings in New Orleans on or around September 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching the weather channel today sept. 4, 2011 on storm lee and at 11:33am reporter mike was live in new orleans and at the background to the right on top of the bridge something cought my eye it was a circular shape, grey changing, fading making erraticall movement then the reporter get split screen he talks for some seconds when he is back in a full shot you see the object again hovering over the right side of the top of the bridge were it changes color dark grey to clear, transparent at the same time is fadeing making an irregular circular movement suddenly it goes very fast and disappears. I would like to know if someone can get that fottage since it was live. don't know if u can ask the weather channel 4 it.
Summary: It suddenly appeard like a grey object on the TV making eratical circle movements then it desapeard.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
